title: Grandma's Boy
short_plot_summary: A 35-year-old video game tester moves in with his grandma and her elderly roommates after getting evicted, while trying to finish a new game he's developing.
explanation: A grandma, representing the protagonist's grandma, who he moves in with
A joystick, symbolizing the main character's job as a video game tester
A robot, representing the video game 'Demonic' the protagonist is working on
A leaf, signifying the character's frequent use of marijuana
A leopard, representing the pet kitty that turns out to be a wild animal
